item.title: Design Review
item.description: In my team at Indeed, I was tasked with the challenge of driving a design review. Indeed has an open culture regarding design reviews. Anyone can join and tune in to any design review session. And anyone can ask questions about the solution. As a start, Indeed has a template for the design review document. I copied the template and filled in the blanks. It felt a little too similar to filling up a Google form (which isn’t great).
